alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTY THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Kings Bay Base, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and minor flooding possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Kings Bay Base, Cumberland Island, and Harrietts Bluff. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
